name: Miniature - The Story Puzzle
description: The Miniature is a unique 3D Story-based puzzle game, a stunning visual world, fascinating music and original game mode.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel i3 processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia / ATI Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
